products.name: YX1 Wireless Earphones
products.description: Tailor your listening experience with bespoke dynamic drivers from the new YX1 Wireless Earphones. Enjoy incredible high-fidelity sound even in noisy environments with its active noise cancellation feature.
features: Experience unrivalled stereo sound with innovative acoustic technology.
Improved ergonomics designed for full-day wearing.
Customizable controls for volume, music, calls, and voice assistants.
7-hour battery life, extendable up to 28 hours with charging case.
Splash-resistant design available in white, grey, and classic black.
